TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content:

Seems to me there is too much thrust.

It shouldnt lift off this fast should it
Mike-NZ, I did a launch to orbit using mechjeb, empty cargo bay flight, it appears to work just fine!

For the life of me, I can't figure out how to get into orbit. I haven't been playing much KSP lately, so it hasn't been since 1.7 was released that I've actually tried to fly a mission (hence why this is such a late post). I can barely get my apoapsis to 100 kilometers with the weakened RS-25s. Is there a nominal ascent trajectory I need to take? Because I run out of fuel well below my previously normal operating altitude (usually inbetween 100 and 120 kilometers). My OMS engines are practically useless because I'm only getting 1/ms from them. 

I apologize if I come off as complaining or whining, but this was my last option. I tried adjusting to thrust for the engines myself, but the thrust values would either stay the same or actually decrease, most oddly. I also tried to replace the 1.7 engines with the engines from 1.6, but they wouldn't load.

I updated to the newest version, but I'm still getting the same results.

Once my ET was drained, I had approximately 400 meters of acceleration to go in a 110x150 km orbit. My OMS was giving me less than 1/ms, and the estimated remaining burn time was over 5 minutes long. By that time, I'd be reentering the atmosphere!![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

If it's of significance, my payload is approximately 8.5 tons. 

I don't wish to make you do something just for me, but instead of tweaking fuel consumption, could you make a patch to make the engines more powerful in vacuum, in case people (like myself) have trouble with the newer engines?

While I'm at it, I'd like to say your work is fantastic. I absolutely can't wait till everything is finished so I can build Space Station Freedom.![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

try that.

if its good I will keep it for the future updates.

what it does:

\*slight increase in ssme and booster thrust

\*increase in specific impulse in all engines for longer duration burn without extra fuel requirements.

\*double oms power

let me know if it too much.

im off to work so will get onto more editing later.

follow the folder structure and overwrite with the cfg files in download.

So, decided to reinstall KSP, and give this shuttle another go. Results:

1. Enterprise has a [pointy nose](https://40.media.tumblr.com/ec1f864ee3bfdab75212b08f23ce2f71/tumblr_nrcj4v9RtG1rpsnwro5_r1_1280.png).

2. RCS thrusters on main shuttle need to be fixed. In this pic, I'm trying to TRANSLATE up, but the rear thrusters are not responding properly. Left thruster block ain't taking s\*\*\* from no one.

![tumblr_nrcj4v9RtG1rpsnwro4_r1_1280.png](https://40.media.tumblr.com/a1c2d59b8807bb42e59f8a56dc73e5f2/tumblr_nrcj4v9RtG1rpsnwro4_r1_1280.png)

3. I'm going to attach jet engines because I can't [NASA](https://36.media.tumblr.com/610bda446c0dffe3c8264adfb8935320/tumblr_nrcj4v9RtG1rpsnwro6_r1_1280.png).

4. MechJeb needs to be updated for this new Shuttle based world.

![tumblr_nrcj4v9RtG1rpsnwro7_r1_1280.png](https://41.media.tumblr.com/8d01d48bd776e31f44c3fc2318ebda1b/tumblr_nrcj4v9RtG1rpsnwro7_r1_1280.png)

yes that's what it is in the configs

Then that's the config you need for Real Solar System. IRL if the payload was over 10 ton's NASA used an "augmented" booster. AKA: double stuffed. They basically changed the burn times and amount of fuel in the srb's so that the main engines could run at a lower throttle in the lower atmosphere and thus saved fuel for later in upper atmosphere.

The augmented booster launches were also the slowest of the launches. If you graph out all the shuttle launches there are five that are below the average curve.

FYI: Challenger was the lightest launch (at the time) and was headed for the fastest launch speed when it had its accident.
